meanings.sent1: She redonned her coat before heading out into the cold.
meanings.sent2: After washing his favorite shirt, he redonned it for the party.
meanings.sent3: The superhero redonned their cape to save the day once more.
meanings.sent4: Like a knight preparing for battle, he redonned his armor.
meanings.sent5: The actor redonned the costume to reprise his role on stage.

meanings.sent1: He redonned his lucky socks for the important game.
meanings.sent2: The bride redonned her wedding dress for the anniversary celebration.
meanings.sent3: The detective redonned the disguise to blend in at the masquerade ball.
meanings.sent4: The old man redonned his military uniform for the Veterans Day parade.
meanings.sent5: She redonned the necklace her grandmother gave her on her birthday.

meanings.sent1: The model redonned the designer gown for the fashion show.
meanings.sent2: She redonned her Halloween costume for the costume party.
meanings.sent3: The actor redonned the historical attire for the period drama.
meanings.sent4: The dancer redonned the ballet outfit for the evening performance.
meanings.sent5: He redonned the chef's hat to cook a special meal for his family.
